LanguageData.GR_PoisonAmpoule.label: poison ampoule
LanguageData.GR_PoisonAmpoule.description: This tiny vial is filled with a concentrated solution of Muffalokomodo saliva, which acts as a powerful neuromuscular-blocking drug. This effectively paralyses anyone that drinks it, though it is not lethal. It will also stop bleeding rate while active, perhaps allowing a person to avoid bleeding to death if the poison is administered quick enough. Effects wear off after 6 hours.
